mapper.insert: insert into bt_eirp (bt_eirp_id, info_id, bt_eirp_classic_lowenergy, bt_eirp_rate, bt_eirp_count, bt_eirp_freq, bt_eirp_result, bt_eirp_judgement, bt_eirp_time, bt_eirp_delete) values (#{btEirpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{infoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{btEirpClassicLowenergy,jdbcType=BIT}, #{btEirpRate,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{btEirpCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{btEirpFreq,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{btEirpResult,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{btEirpJudgement,jdbcType=BIT}, #{btEirpTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{btEirpDelete,jdbcType=BIT})
mapper.update: update bt_eirp set info_id = #{infoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bt_eirp_classic_lowenergy = #{btEirpClassicLowenergy,jdbcType=BIT}, bt_eirp_rate = #{btEirpRate,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, bt_eirp_count = #{btEirpCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bt_eirp_freq = #{btEirpFreq,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, bt_eirp_result = #{btEirpResult,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, bt_eirp_judgement = #{btEirpJudgement,jdbcType=BIT}, bt_eirp_time = #{btEirpTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, bt_eirp_delete = #{btEirpDelete,jdbcType=BIT} where bt_eirp_id = #{btEirpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
